archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.4.5c: c) publicly available information (e.g. open source threat information, threat data feeds and social media) including such information that may be available on the dark web
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
